price: 复活确是要来临的，毫无疑义，安拉要使坟墓里的人复活起来。
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡعَثُ مَن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-sāʿata ātiyatun lā rayba fīhā wa-anna al-laha yabʿathu man fī al-qubūri
